title: Large-Scale: Mobile-Based Open Educational Resources (OER) Development and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital device usage, learning experience in social studies
context.additional_context: Strengthening OER (Open Educational Resources) development capabilities in social sciences within smartphone-centric limited environments.

learning_goals: Learners iteratively improve social domain OER prototypes at least three times applying Agile methodologies
Learners can explain OER reuse and modification design principles in mobile environments with over 80% alignment to application cases
Learners develop at least two customized OER contents based on target learner analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
